logs: Administrators can now reset user passwords and 2FA in case password/authenticator is lost or forgotten
Some tables now have pages to simplify searching for information you need
Offline mode now supports all actions, including accepting/rejecting applications, adding notes, etc.
My HR now works offline and you can also install it as an app by following a prompt in your browser!
Major performance improvements
Sign-in forms now feature advanced validation
Performance improvements
Minor usability fixes
Dark mode is very dark now!
You can now sign out individual devices in settings
Security patch
You can now add and remove icons from Dock in Desktop
Applications also have notes now
My HR now collects user feedback
You can read it on a feedback page
On a new note page you can now leave notes for yourself and other users of My HR
Notes can be private or public
Dark mode!
Help page was added
New Desktop background
Desktop windows are now restored at launch
Desktop now has settings panel
You can now choose to hide Desktop menu and Dock
You will now see welcome messages on first login and after updates
Minor design updates
Design overhaul
Improved login and registration experience
My HR Desktop was added
Migrated to the new core libraries
Links in applications are now clickable
Filtering improvements
Performance overhaul
Applications can now be filtered by team
An email is now sent when an application is accepted/rejected
Security patch
Applications can now be accepted or rejected
New home page
You can now star applications
Share button was added
Pages now have different titles
This page was added
404 page was added
You can now view your active sessions in settings
Version number was added at the bottom of the page
Admins can now add and delete users
You can now change your password in settings
Moved application view onto a separate page
2FA fixes and improvements
Two-Factor authentication is introduced
Applications can now be viewed on the home page
Initial My HR release
Users can register and log in with their password now
